t: Amazon.com: Safer Brand 5110-6 Insect Killing Soap, 32 Oz. : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: Utilizes the power of potassium salts of fatty acids. The potassium salts weaken the insect's waxy protective outer shell. Apply every 7-10 days or as needed to prevent damage. Unlike traditional synthetic chemicals, Safer Brand is safe to use around children and pets.
